amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds made available under this Act for bicycle paths so that the funds can be used to improve bridge and road safety.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 2811 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 80 - 18. Record Vote Number: 333.

Amendment SA 2811 proposed by Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S11381-11383, S11383-11384, S11396; text: CR S11381) To prohibit the use of funds made available under this Act for bicycle paths so that the funds can be used to improve bridge and road safety.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 2811 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 80 - 18. Record Vote Number: 333.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2811 proposed by Senator Coburn.
